HMarkupView

Serves as a mixin class for classes that need to draw markup but don’t inherit from the HView.

Summary
HMarkupView
Serves as a mixin class for classes that need to draw markup but don’t inherit from the HView.
Instance variables
bindMarkupVariables
Evaluates the pieces of code defined in the markup template marked with syntax #{}.
toggleCSSClass
Sets or unsets the _cssClass into a DOM element that goes by the ID _elementId.

Instance variables

markupThe markup from the component’s HTML template.

See also

HView

bindMarkupVariables

bindMarkupVariables: function()

Evaluates the pieces of code defined in the markup template marked with syntax #{}.  Can’t use } characters in the code though.  This might need another look...

Places the resulting markup in the instance variable.

toggleCSSClass

toggleCSSClass: function(_elementId,
_cssClass,
_setOn)

Sets or unsets the _cssClass into a DOM element that goes by the ID _elementId.

Parameters

_elementIdID of the DOM element, or the element itself, to be modified.
_cssClassName of the CSS class to be added or removed.
_setOnBoolean value that tells should the CSS class be added or removed.
